item.description:
We'll see a great movie and clarify all the characters regarding type and type relationship dynamics - a perfect way to deepen your knowledge of the Enneagram. We'll stop and start the movie to clearly see types and relationship dynamics in the movie, including subtypes. Lots of fun. Dinner and snacks provided! Vegetarian Dinner 7:00 Movie 8:00

$30, sliding scale to $20

Without dinner, $5 less

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. Counseling, is an Enneagram teacher, therapist and personal life coach. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and also Herb's Tips for Living.

www.herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, corner of Tanager, Wollaston and West St.
item.name: Enneagram at the Movies - Jane Eyre 2011
